TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataLoadOptions extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供以進行相關資料的立即載入和篩選。

span.span: Provides for immediate loading and filtering of related data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 一般General 當您查詢物件時，實際上只擷取了所要求的物件。When you query for an object, you actually retrieve only the object you requested. *相關*物件無法自動擷取一次。The *related* objects are not automatically fetched at the same time. (如需詳細資訊，請參閱[跨關聯性查詢](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/linq/querying-across-relationships.md)。)(For more information, see [Querying Across Relationships](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/linq/querying-across-relationships.md).) 類別提供兩種方法可以達到立即載入指定的相關資料。The class provides two methods to achieve immediate loading of specified related data. 方法可讓以立即載入與主要目標相關的資料。The method allows for immediate loading of data related to the main target. 方法可讓篩選相關的物件。The method allows for filtering related objects. ## 規則Rules 請注意下列規則有關使用量：Note the following rules regarding usage: - 指派至第一個查詢執行之後產生的例外狀況。Assigning a to a after the first query has been executed generates an exception. - 修改指派給之後產生例外狀況Modifying a after it has been assigned to a generates an exception ## 循環處理Cycle Handling 和指示詞必須不會建立循環。 and directives must not create cycles. 下列表示此類圖形的範例：The following represent examples of such graphs: - 範例 1： 自我遞迴Example 1: Self recursive - `dlo.LoadWith(e => e.Reports);` - 範例 2： 返回指標Example 2: Back-pointers - `dlo.LoadWith (c => C.Orders);` - `dlo.LoadWith (o => o.Customer);` - 範例 3： 較長的循環Example 3: Longer cycles 雖然這不應該發生格式標準化模型中，很可能。Although this should not occur in a well-normalized model, it is possible. - `dlo.LoadWith (a => a.Bs);` - `dlo.LoadWith (b => b.Cs);` - `dlo.LoadWith (c => c.As);` - 範例 4： 自我遞迴子查詢Example 4: Self recursive subQueries - `dlo.AssociateWith(a=>a.As.Where(a=>a.Id=33));` - 範例 5： 長遞迴子查詢Example 5: Longer recursive subqueries - `dlo.AssociateWith(a=>a.Bs.Where(b=>b.Id==3));` - `dlo.AssociateWith(b=>b.As.Where(a=>a.Id==3));` 以下是一些一般的規則可幫助您了解這些案例中發生的事件。The following are some general rules that help you understand what occurs in these scenarios. **LoadWith**每次呼叫會檢查是否已引進循環至圖形。**LoadWith** Each call to checks whether cycles have been introduced into the graph. 如果有，如範例 1、 2 和 3，擲回例外狀況。If there are, as in Examples 1, 2, and 3, an exception is thrown. **AssociateWith**運算式內的關聯性在執行階段引擎不會套用現有的子查詢子句。**AssociateWith** The engine at run time does not apply the existing SubQuery clauses to the relationship inside the expression. - 範例 4`Where`子句會針對所有執行`A`，不只是子篩選由本身的子查詢運算式 （因為也就是遞迴）In Example 4, the `Where` clause is executed against all `A`, not just the ones sub-filtered by the SubQuery expression itself (because that would be recursive) - 範例 5 中，第一個`Where`子句套用至所有`B`s，即使是在子查詢沒有`B`。In Example 5, the first `Where` clause is applied to all the `B`s, even though there are subqueries on `B`. 第二個`Where`子句套用至所有`A`即使是沒有 s 的子查詢上`A`。The second `Where` clause is applied to all the `A`s even though there are subqueries on `A`. ## Examples 當您擷取`Customers`從 Northwind 範例資料庫中，您可以使用指定`Orders`也是用來擷取。When you retrieve `Customers` from the Northwind sample database, you can use to specify that `Orders` is also to be retrieved. 您甚至可以指定哪些子集`Orders`擷取。You can even specify which subset of `Orders` to retrieve.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AssociateWith(class System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression expression) cil managed

param.name: expression
param.span: 將查詢識別為用於特定的一對多欄位或屬性。

span.span: Identifies the query to be used on a particular one-to-many field or property.
Note the following:

param.span: 如果運算式的開頭不是表示一對多關聯性的欄位或屬性，則會擲回例外狀況。

span.span: If the expression does not start with a field or property that represents a one-to-many relationship, an exception is thrown.

param.span: 如果運算式中出現無效的運算子，則會擲回例外狀況。

span.span: If an operator other than a valid operator appears in the expression, an exception is thrown.
Valid operators are as follows:
Where
OrderBy
ThenBy
OrderByDescending
ThenByDescending
Take

summary.span: 篩選針對特定關聯性所擷取的物件。

span.span: Filters the objects retrieved for a particular relationship.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在下列範例中，內部迴圈會逐一查看只會比`Orders`，都不寄今天。In the following example, the inner loop iterates only over those `Orders` that have not been shipped today. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.DataLoadOptions#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.dataloadoptions/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.DataLoadOptions#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.dataloadoptions/vb/module1.vb#1)]

param.span: 將查詢識別為用於特定的一對多欄位或屬性。

span.span: Identifies the query to be used on a particular one-to-many field or property.
Note the following:

param.span: 如果運算式的開頭不是表示一對多關聯性的欄位或屬性，則會擲回例外狀況。

span.span: If the expression does not start with a field or property that represents a one-to-many relationship, an exception is thrown.

param.span: 如果運算式中出現無效的運算子，則會擲回例外狀況。

span.span: If an operator other than a valid operator appears in the expression, an exception is thrown.
Valid operators are as follows:
Where
OrderBy
ThenBy
OrderByDescending
ThenByDescending
Take

summary.span: 篩選針對特定關聯性所擷取的物件。

span.span: Filters objects retrieved for a particular relationship.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需如何避免循環資訊，請參閱。For information about how to avoid cycles, see . ## Examples 在下列範例中，內部迴圈會逐一查看只會比`Orders`，都不寄今天。In the following example, the inner loop iterates only over those `Orders` that have not been shipped today. [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.DataLoadOptions#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.dataloadoptions/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.DataLoadOptions#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.dataloadoptions/vb/module1.vb#1)]

.method public hidebysig instance void LoadWith(class System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression expression) cil managed

param.name: expression
param.span: 可識別相關內容的 lambda 運算式。

span.span: A lambda expression that identifies the related material.

summary.span: 使用 lambda 運算式，擷取與主要目標相關之指定的資料。

span.span: Retrieves specified data related to the main target by using a lambda expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在下列範例中，執行查詢時，會擷取位在倫敦 (London) 之所有 `Orders` 的所有 `Customers`。In the following example, all the `Orders` for all the `Customers` who are located in London are retrieved when the query is executed. 如此一來，後續存取 `Orders` 物件上的 `Customer` 屬性時，便不會觸發新的資料庫查詢。As a result, successive access to the `Orders` property on a `Customer` object does not trigger a new database query. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.DataLoadOptions#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.dataloadoptions/cs/program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.DataLoadOptions#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.dataloadoptions/vb/module1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void LoadWith<T>(class System.Linq.Expressions.Expression`1<class System.Func`2<!!T, object>> expression) cil managed
Public Sub LoadWith(Of T) (expression As Expression(Of Func(Of T, Object)))

typeparam.name: T

span.span: Type that is queried against.

typeparam.span: 如果此型別不相符，就會擲回例外狀況。

span.span: If this type is unmapped, an exception is thrown.

param.name: expression
param.span: 識別要擷取的欄位或屬性。

span.span: Identifies the field or property to be retrieved.

param.span: 如果運算式不是識別為表示一對一或一對多關聯性的欄位或屬性，則會擲回例外狀況。

span.span: If the expression does not identify a field or property that represents a one-to-one or one-to-many relationship, an exception is thrown.

summary.span: 指定當送出型別 T 物件的查詢時，要擷取的子物件。

span.span: Specifies which sub-objects to retrieve when a query is submitted for an object of type T.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您不能指定兩個層級的關聯性的載入 (例如， `Orders.OrderDetails`)。You cannot specify the loading of two levels of relationships (for example, `Orders.OrderDetails`). 在這些案例中，您必須指定兩個不同方法。In these scenarios you must specify two separate methods. 若要避免循環，請參閱 < 備註 > 一節中。To avoid cycling, see Remarks section in . ## Examples 在下列範例中，執行查詢時，會擷取位在倫敦 (London) 之所有 `Orders` 的所有 `Customers`。In the following example, all the `Orders` for all the `Customers` who are located in London are retrieved when the query is executed. 如此一來，後續存取 `Orders` 物件上的 `Customer` 屬性時，便不會觸發新的資料庫查詢。As a result, successive access to the `Orders` property on a `Customer` object does not trigger a new database query. [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.DataLoadOptions#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.dataloadoptions/cs/program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.DataLoadOptions#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.dataloadoptions/vb/module1.vb#2)]
